channel.title: Zoom / Camera Movement in 508
channel.description:
I think it is client sided, but is it possible, to make a 508 client wich can Zoom / move the camera, like Moparscape and some other 317 Clients..
If searched the whole forum, and no one have a solution.
If it can, does someone have a script or client? (I prefer a HD Client, but a SD Client is also good)

item.title: Zoom / Camera Movement in 508
item.dc:creator: @supyap supyap
item.description:
@supyap wrote:

I’m a beginner, and i think it is not the easiest thing you can code.

But i’m trying to use the 317 zoom script in 508…

Read full topic

item.title: Zoom / Camera Movement in 508
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

[quote=“supyap, post:3, topic:319546”]lol , SD = Standard Detail, also known as Low Detail

And that was not what i meant, its like zooming further then normal, and move the camera on a specific position, like Moparscape can.[/quote]

The answer is simple:

code it yourself

Read full topic

  2. You can use the arrow keys to move the camera.
